thread.title: Twenty One Pilots strip down to boxers at Grammys
thread.title_full: Twenty One Pilots strip down to boxers at Grammys

author: KATE FELDMAN
title: Twenty One Pilots strip down to boxers at Grammys
text:
Twenty One Pilots strip down to boxer briefs to accept best pop duo Grammy Award Twenty One Pilots strip down to boxer briefs at Grammys Josh Dun and Tyler Joseph of Twenty One Pilots accepted the award for Best Pop Duo/Group Performance in their boxers. (Kevin Winter/Getty Images for NARAS)  45 PM 
Twenty One Pilots weren’t stressed out at the Grammy Awards Sunday night. 
In fact, Tyler Joseph and Josh Dun pretended they were right at home. 
After winning the best pop duo/group Grammy for “Stressed Out,” the duo stripped down to their boxer briefs before walking onto the stage. 
“‘If we ever win a Grammy, we should receive it just like this,’” Joseph said they decided. Host James Corden ditched his pants in support of the duo. (Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images) 
“I want everyone at home watching to know that you could be next.” 
James Corden also came back from the commercial break in his underwear before introducing Ed Sheeran for his performance. Join the Conversation:
